subject: Simsonn pro x upgrade pedals
description_text:
Dear,can I connect simsonn pro x upgrade
  pedals directly to fanatec wheel base,and how

conversations.body_text: Hi dalibor kolic,     Our pedals can only be connected directly to a PC via USB. May I ask what purpose you have in mind for connecting them to a Fanatec base?

Connect to ps5 to play

sri, 11. lip 2025. 15:03 service@simsonn.com

The previous versions could be merged to fanatec base directly,and play
with ps5

sri, 11. lip 2025. 15:30 dalibor kolic <daliborkolic6@gmail.com> je napisao:

> Connect to ps5 to play
>
> sri, 11. lip 2025. 15:03 service@simsonn.com

Hi dalibor kolic,     We haven't implemented support for Fanatec's CAN protocol yet, but we’ll start working on it soon. You mentioned that a previous version worked — could you let us know which version that was?

My mistake simnet has fanatec support,if be nice ,if you could also have
it,if it is miguce

pet, 13. lip 2025. 06:26 service@simsonn.com
Hi dalibor kolic,  We will add support for Fanatec as soon as possible.
